channel.title: Server Help [?] [317]
channel.description:
Hey.
I'm not really sure how to explain this, but..
I'm using a "cheezscape" source to practice my first server, but when I try to logon to local host, (through moparscape,) my account is just nulled. When I check my servers logs, it says my character is already logged in. I've tried this with different account, each with different privileges.
I bet This is no help at all, I've never been good at explaining things. Thanks for reading this, however.

item.title: Server Help [?] [317]
item.dc:creator: @prison190 prison190
item.description:
@prison190 wrote:

umm, first off your source doesnt come with a client?, second make sure the client AND THE SOURCE is hosting/connecting from local host aka 127.0.0.1 …

Read full topic
